ARABIC: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن يَلْعَنِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ نَصِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those are the ones Allah has cursed. And if someone is cursed by Allah you will not find any one to help him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They are the ones who were cursed by God; and those who are cursed by God will have none to protect them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Such are the ones whom Allah has cursed; and he whom Allah curses has none to come to his help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God has condemned them. No one can help one who has been condemned by God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is they whom Allah has cursed; and for those whom Allah has cursed, you (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) will never find any supporter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They are those whom Allah has cursed, and he whom Allah curses, you will not find for him (any) helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Those are they whom Allah has cursed, and whomever Allah curses you shall not find any helper for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those are they whom God has cursed; he whom God has cursed, thou wilt not find for him any helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those are they whom Allah hath cursed, and he whom Allah hath cursed, thou (O Muhammad) wilt find for him no helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those are the ones God has rejected: you will not find anyone to help those God has rejected.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These are they whom Allah hath cursed; and whomsoever Allah curseth, for him thou shalt not find a helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They are the ones whom Allah has cursed, and whomever Allah curses, you will never find any helper for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They are (men) whom Allah hath cursed: And those whom Allah Hath cursed, thou wilt find, have no one to help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They are those whom Allah has cursed, and he whom Allah curses, you will not find for him (any) helper,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those are they whom Allah has cursed and whosoever Allah has cursed, you will not find any helper for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those are they whom God has cursed. Whomever God curses, you will find no savior for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those are the ones whom Allah has cursed; and he whom Allah curses - never will you find for him a helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:52] Those are the ones whom God has cursed; and he whom God has cursed, you will never find for him any helper, anyone to protect him from His chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Those are they whom Allah hath cursed) Allah has punished them by imposing on them the capitation tax, (and he whom Allah hath cursed) he whom Allah punishes in this world or in the Hereafter, (thou) Muhammad (wilt find for him no helper) to save him from Allah's punishment.
